text: Andrian Zbîrnea (born ) is a Moldovan male weightlifter, competing in the 105 kg category and representing Moldova at international competitions. He competed at world championships, most recently at the 2014 World Weightlifting Championships. At the 2015 European Weightlifting Championships Zbîrnea won the silver medal in overall ranking. In June 2015 the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) has suspended Adrian Zbîrnea in view of a potential anti-doping rule violation, after he returned a positive A sample for anabolic agents. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2014 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 105 kg ||175||180|| ~~185~~ ||8||210||215|| ~~220~~ ||10||395||9 |- ! colspan=13|European Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Tbilisi, Georgia || 105 kg || || ||177 ||7|| ||222|| ||3||399||DSQ |} ==References== ==External links== * IWRP profile * IWF profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan male weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Doping cases in weightlifting Category:Moldovan sportspeople in doping cases
